trans-unit.source: Sample data in Azure blob containers, SQL Server, and Hive tables | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Sample data in Azure blob containers, SQL Server, and Hive tables | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: How to explore data stored in various Azure enviromnents.
trans-unit.target: How to explore data stored in various Azure enviromnents.

trans-unit.source: Sample data in Azure blob containers, SQL Server, and Hive tables
trans-unit.target: Sample data in Azure blob containers, SQL Server, and Hive tables

trans-unit.source: This document covers how to sample data that is stored three Azure locations typically used when analyzing and modeling data in the Cortana Analytics Process:
trans-unit.target: This document covers how to sample data that is stored three Azure locations typically used when analyzing and modeling data in the Cortana Analytics Process:

trans-unit.source: **Azure blob container data** is sampled by downloading it programmatically and then sampling it with sample Python code.
trans-unit.target: **Azure blob container data** is sampled by downloading it programmatically and then sampling it with sample Python code.

trans-unit.source: **SQL Server data** is sampled using both SQL and the Python Programming Language.
trans-unit.target: **SQL Server data** is sampled using both SQL and the Python Programming Language.

trans-unit.source: **Hive table data** is sampled using Hive queries.
trans-unit.target: **Hive table data** is sampled using Hive queries.

trans-unit.source: The **menu** below links to the topics that describe how to sample data from each of these Azure storage environments.
trans-unit.target: The **menu** below links to the topics that describe how to sample data from each of these Azure storage environments.

trans-unit.source: This sampling task is a step in the [Cortana Analytics Process (CAP)](https://azure.microsoft.com/documentation/learning-paths/cortana-analytics-process/).
trans-unit.target: This sampling task is a step in the [Cortana Analytics Process (CAP)](https://azure.microsoft.com/documentation/learning-paths/cortana-analytics-process/).

trans-unit.source: If the dataset you plan to analyze is large, it is usually a good idea to down-sample the data to reduce it to a smaller but representative and more manageable size.
trans-unit.target: If the dataset you plan to analyze is large, it is usually a good idea to down-sample the data to reduce it to a smaller but representative and more manageable size.

trans-unit.source: This facilitates data understanding, exploration, and feature engineering.
trans-unit.target: This facilitates data understanding, exploration, and feature engineering.

trans-unit.source: Its role in the Cortana Analytics Process is to enable fast prototyping of the data processing functions and machine learning models.
trans-unit.target: Its role in the Cortana Analytics Process is to enable fast prototyping of the data processing functions and machine learning models.
